summary: With help from his friends, a Memphis pimp in a mid-life crisis attempts to become a successful hip-hop emcee.

Henson|DJ Qualls|Ludacris|Paula Jai Parker|Elise Neal|Isaac Hayes|Juicy J|William Engram|Bobby Sandimanie|Haystak|Claude Phillips|Josey Scott|John Still|Jay Munn|Michael Hooks Jr.|Jerome Toles|D.J. Sharpe|Lindsey Roberts|Free Sol|Clarence Mabon|Mark Goodfellow|Latasha Texas|Tracy Davis|Erica Miller|Helen Bowman|Jeff Pope|Josh Driver|Shariee Jones|Dennis Phillippi
title: Hustle & Flow
